content:
# This is an introductory inject

You have a few minutes to read this and familiarize yourselves with the platform. Injects like these represent events in the simulated world of this exercise.

## Tools

You can interact with the world using the tools on the right part of your screen. 

For example, to use a browser, select it from the panel on the very right and enter the required argument, let's say `test.ex`. Once you've done that, click on Submit button to use the simulated browser command. You will get a response.
       
## Rules
* Use only one computer to interact with the exercise.
* Discuss every action you take with your teammates.
* Do not try to intentionally "break" the exercise. You may damage the experience for the entire group.
        
## Limitations
* You can only send an email to one address at a time. 
* Do not rely on a built-in browser in the platform; instead, use "Download file" to view files locally using your browser.

If you are having trouble with the technical part of the exercise, ask the instructors in person.
        
Instructors

**mails_received_from** _it_department@mail.ex_

**response**: 1 mail sent to kathy@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex,
1 mail sent to lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex,
1 mail sent to peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex

**block_to** _https://nice-project.uni.ex/_

**response**: Target IP address or email address was not found

The exercise will conclude in one minute.

Instructors
